column1: #Coronavirus: Britain faces 'very dangerous moment' as lockdown eased, says top government adviser

Amid increasing global concerns over the supply chain impact of #covid19, @Sandoz_Global has pledged to keep the prices for a basket of essential medicines it markets stable https://www.pbiforum.net/mag/featured/sandoz-pledges-to-keep-prices-stable-for-essential-meds-amid-coronavirus-supply-fears/

Two Phase 3 clinical studies have been initiated by @GileadSciences to evaluate remdesivir in adults diagnosed with #covid19 #coronavirus https://www.pbiforum.net/mag/featured/gilead-initiates-two-studies-evaluating-remdesivir-in-covid-19/

A vaccine candidate for #Covid19 developed by @NovavaxInc will move into clinical testing within a matter of months #coronavirus https://www.pbiforum.net/mag/featured/novavax-well-positioned-to-advance-covid-19-vaccine-candidate-to-clinical-testing/
